subdivision_of_building:
Proposed Development: Installation of a Dropped Kerb for Vehicular Access

Details of Affected Areas:
-External Frontage: The proposed works involve modifying the external frontage of the property, specifically the public footpath and kerb directly adjacent to the front boundary.
-Front Garden (Hardstanding Area): The existing hardstanding area within the front garden will be utilized for vehicular access.

Scope of Work:
-Kerb Modification: Lowering a section of the existing kerb to create a smooth transition between the road and the property's frontage.
-Pavement Reinforcement: Strengthening the pavement to support vehicular movement, adhering to safety and structural requirements.
-Drainage Enhancement: Installing a trench drain to manage surface water runoff effectively, addressing the current lack of drainage in the hardstanding area.
-Landscaping Improvements: Incorporating three planting zones that will constitute at least 10% of the total area, enhancing aesthetics and contributing to natural drainage.

Note: No alterations or works are proposed for the main building structure; all activities are confined to the external areas as described above.
description: Install a dropped kerb to facilitate vehicular access from the classified road to the property's front garden, which will be converted into a parking area.
